Blackstorm:

Blackstorm heard happyly what Maxima said, at last she would be 
trained.

"That means that soon I'll start to slag Maximals, will I????" she 
said "WOW!!!! After that slight training can I slag some maximals???"



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/22/03 12:14:16 AM Central Daylight Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Sure..."replied th femme with a wide smile"What have I do?"
> > 
> > 
> 
> She turned, "First... follow me. I'm sure we can spar & do some 
target 
> practice." inwardly she would need it for the next time she met up 
with 
> Rodimus. She wanted to have a piece of him, to battle him 
personally, to 
> damage him but let him suffer until Hydras terminated him. 
> 
> She glanced back at Blackstorm & smirked. At least, the first 
torture for 
> Rodimus would be very sweet. Turning Blackstorm into a cold & 
vicious killer, 
> with no trace of whatever she once was. 
> 
> "Perceptor informs me that you need a little practice as well. 
Though I don't 
> call it practice.. but preparation. You are a fembot. A Predacon 
or 
> Decepticon fembot at that." she started as they moved to find a 
sparring 
> area, hopefully they had a room large enough. "Decepticon fembots 
were, & 
> still are, vicious... shadowy.... emotionless... precise... 
lethal... 
> assasins & warriors." She stopped & turned to Blackstorm. "It's 
time to count 
> yourself as one of those few who could be worthy in the optics of 
Megatron." 
> She deep femme voice resounded in confidence.
